/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. 

Vehicles, including cars and buses, are seen moving along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
